## WorkflowService.startWorkflow() method

Starts the Workflow process for a Publication. This operation returns an instance of 'ProcessInstance' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static startWorkflow(escapedPublicationId: string, requestModel: StartWorkflowInstruction): CancelablePromise<ProcessInstance>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter            | Type                                                                      | Description                                                                                               |
| -------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| escapedPublicationId | string                                                                    | The TCM URI of a Publication with the colon escaped by replacing it with an underscore. E.g. "tcm_0-1-1". |
| requestModel         | [StartWorkflowInstruction](./open-api-client.startworkflowinstruction.md) | The model to use for the request.                                                                         |

**Returns:**

[CancelablePromise](./open-api-client.cancelablepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;[ProcessInstance](./open-api-client.processinstance.md)<!-- -->&gt;

ProcessInstance The request has completed and has resulted in one or more new resources being created.

## Exceptions

ApiError
